ch0007_00_acerola/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hiya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d see you today!
ch0007_00_acerola/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m so excited you’re here!
Time for some fun!
ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_01_10:
How do people usually greet each other
here on Pasio?
ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_02_10:
In Alola we say, “Alola!”
It means, “Hello!”
ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0701_03_10:
Remember that! That way, if you ever
decide to visit Alola, you’ll know how
to greet other Trainers!
ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0702_01_10:
Alola is really scenic and beautiful, just
like Pasio! And we’ve got really yummy
food there, too!
ch0007_00_acerola/0601_0702_02_10:
If you end up visiting, I’ll tell you all
about our Alolan myths and legends!
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_01_10: My Palossand is really great with kids.
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_02_10:
She loves to frolic and play with
tiny tots and other little Pokémon!
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_03_10:
Story time is when I like to shine, though.
I love reading to the kids.
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0701_04_10:
Palossand actually likes to join in and
learn right along with them!
She’s just the cutest.
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_01_10:
We all have different things we’re good at—
different values, different ways of thinking...
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_02_10:
and the same is true about Pokémon!
Everyone is unique and special
in their own way.
ch0007_00_acerola/0602_0702_03_10:
That’s why it makes me so happy when
we work together and help each other!
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_01_10:
I love reading! You can find a book
about pretty much anything, you know!
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_02_10:
Books can take us on journeys to fantastical
worlds and tell the stories of people far
away from us.
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_03_10:
Isn’t that amazing?! I’ve read some books
that made me shiver in suspense and some that
made me shake with excitement!
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0701_04_10:
Do you like reading, too? If so, I can
recommend all kinds of books to you!
Just say the word!
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0702_01_10:
I’d love to go visit the library in
Sinnoh one day!
ch0007_00_acerola/0603_0702_02_10:
I heard it has all kinds of books on the
ancient myths and legends of Sinnoh.
I wonder what they’re about!
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_01_10:
Ghost Pokémon are so free-spirited.
I never know what they’re going to do next!
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_02_10:
The other day, I blinked and my Drifblim caught
a breeze and drifted away somewhere.
The poor thing got so lost...
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_03_10:
And my Sableye is always causing mischief,
scribbling in the children’s storybooks
when they’re not looking.
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_04_10:
And my Dhelmise! Don’t get me started on
that time it made friends with some Skrelp
at the beach and brought them home to play!
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0701_05_10:
Ghost Pokémon may be free-spirited and
mischievous, but you know what?
That’s what I love about them!
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0702_01_10:
When I’m with my Ghost-type Pokémon,
I don’t get scared even when it’s
pitch-black outside!
ch0007_00_acerola/0604_0702_02_10:
Dark nights actually make me really
excited! Playing in the dark is such a
fun thrill!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]? I just wanted
to say thank you for being such a good friend!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_02_10:
Oh, sorry... Did that come out of nowhere?
I’ve actually been thinking about it
for a long time! Tee-hee!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_03_10:
It was pure luck that brought us together,
and I feel so lucky that we’re such
good friends now!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0701_04_10:
I hope we can keep doing fun things together!
There’s a whole world of exciting things
for us to do out there!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0702_01_10:
With so many other amazing Trainers on this
island, I’m so glad you chose to spend
time with us!
ch0007_00_acerola/0605_0702_02_10:
In return, Palossand and I promise to
help you out the best we can!
ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0701_01_10:
Look! I found this when I was
taking a little walk earlier!
ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0701_02_10:
Shhh... Here, it’ll be our little secret.
Don’t be afraid to use it, though!
ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0702_01_10:
Taking a stroll on a road you’re familiar
with can still lead to something new!
ch0007_00_acerola/1701_0702_02_10:
When you discover something different from
the norm, it’s that much more exciting!
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_01_10:
I wonder how everyone is doing back home at
Aether House. They’re like my family.
I miss them so much!
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s kind of strange, though. When I’m with
you, I almost feel like I’m back there
with the kids.
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0701_03_10:
It feels warm... Content, maybe?
Odd, isn’t it. But in a good way.
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_01_10:
Back at Aether House, I’m like everyone’s
big sister! They all really depend on me.
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_02_10:
You can lean on me, too, if you want!
Taking care of others is like second
nature to me now, and I like doing it!
ch0007_00_acerola/2501_0702_03_10:
Would you let me lean on you for help in return
if I need to? That would make me really happy!
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_01_10:
You know, it’s spooky how well the
two of us get along together!
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_02_10:
I get the same feeling when I’m with you
as I do with my sweet Palossand!
I’ve never had a friend like you before.
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0701_03_10:
Let’s be friends forever! You’re my
favorite teammate—I dunno what I’d do
without you!
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_01_10:
Everyone’s always happy in Alola—
the people and the Pokémon!
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s why I love it so much!
Everyone feels like one big family.
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_03_10:
And now we have one more person
to add to that family...
It’s you, of course!
ch0007_00_acerola/2511_0702_04_10: Heehee! I’m talking about you, y’know!
ch0007_00_acerola/3001_0701_01_10:
G’morning! I’ve got so much energy today!
Come on, let’s go have some fun!
ch0007_00_acerola/3002_0701_01_10:
Morning! The day’s just begun!
What do you think I should do?
ch0007_00_acerola/3003_0701_01_10:
Hiya! I always feel so peppy this time of day.
It’s the best time to go for a stroll!
ch0007_00_acerola/3004_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Did you eat yet? I’m ready to go out
for some battling if you’re done.
ch0007_00_acerola/3005_0701_01_10:
Nighttime is definitely my time!
I’m ready to go out and have some more fun!
ch0007_00_acerola/3006_0701_01_10:
Evening!
My Pokémon and I really love dark nights!
